issue.title: [Urban Feature] Camera coordinate frame changed from gazebo9 to ignition

content.raw: I looked into a couple of camera urdfs that were used in gazebo9 and confirmed that the optical frame is indeed different from ignition. Like you said, we probably don’t want to change things now but it’s something to consider after the tunnel circuit.
content.html: I looked into a couple of camera urdfs that were used in gazebo9 and confirmed that the optical frame is indeed different from ignition. Like you said, we probably don’t want to change things now but it’s something to consider after the tunnel circuit.
